chatbot.title: ConsultIA Assistant
chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm the virtual assistant of ConsultIA. How can I help you today?
chatbot.default: Thank you for your message. A consultant will get back to you as soon as possible. For any urgent matter, please don't hesitate to call us.

responses.transformation: Digital transformation is at the core of our expertise. We support companies in their transition to digital with tailored solutions. Would you like more information about our approaches?
responses.ai: Our AI solutions are designed to automate processes and improve decision-making. We offer custom solutions adapted to your industry.
responses.pricing: Our rates vary according to your specific needs. We offer a free initial consultation to assess your project. Would you like to be contacted by one of our consultants?
